name: Sakura Hime 2
description:
Badge

Game Introduction

Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey in Fairyland has started. While enjoying the time with a lively cat girl, passionate bunny girl, mysterious witch, or an incredible magician, do you want to save the world at the same time?

All you need to do is swap the blocks to make the pattern complete.

Special Features

  • One-handed mode
  • CG gallery mode
  • 10 unique girls to experience
